header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: After Clause 63, insert the following new Clause—
“Property auctions: guide price not to be less than reserve price
text.IndentOne: After section 3 of the Auctions (Bidding Agreements) Act 1969, insert the following new section—
text.quote: “3A Property auctions: guide price not to be less than reserve price
text.IndentOne: Where a reserve price has been set at a public auction for land or real property, the reserve price for that land or real property shall not exceed the guide price, or the lower figure in a range of guide prices, indicated in any publication by the auctioneer.””
